website_summaries.verdict: Offers similar features as others in its class, but doesn't always deliver when it comes to smart capabilities or sound quality.
pros: Sports 4K UHD and useful ports and inputs that combine to deliver versatile entertainment options
Price falls on the lower end of the range
cons: It has Bluetooth, but it lacks reliable connectivity and is difficult to pair to some devices
Doesn't have the best sound, and the bass isn't very deep

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic support that refused to help setup.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt know how this sounds or anything else since I ran into trouble setting it up and Denon support in essence told me they don't support anything and I was on my own. Now being that I work in support myself I find this to be unacceptable in any way shape or form I would not ever suggest to anyone that this is a good product or suggest they buy it. Save your money and buy a product that the company stands behind. Oh and their online web product manual is basically worthless as well.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommed this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with this product from the first day I used it. The sound drops out intermittently. It has began to trip the circuit breaker in the house. We have only owned the product for 60 days and its already out of warranty. Tried to have it returned or replaced with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this garbage!
customer_reviews.text: I got this delivered on October 8, 2018, and it basically shut down last week. The monitor out stopped working, and almost all the audio outputs(speakers) stopped as well. Of course this was past any support from Amazon. Calls to Denon about warranty support are not answered as they are always experiencing higher than normal volume. Save your money and buy a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K Foss

customer_reviews.title: Lots of technical issues
customer_reviews.text: It really just doesn't work very well. I would not get this product. I have other dennons that work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Zarlenga

customer_reviews.title: Stress comes with it
customer_reviews.text: Avoid the stress , do not get this one. 4K computability is one problem , all your devises should comply with it. Then Bluetooth , connecting my IPhone7 is easy but only last for 2-3 songs on shuffle , then I have to press next again. And sometimes clicking on Bluetooth turns on my TV and cable . Stress !
customer_reviews.author: Tibor Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit no audio no osd
customer_reviews.text: On first boot it started assisted setup. Gets stuck on testing left front speakers as there is no audio coming from it. I trsted speakers and they are fine. Also on-screen display does not work. It never shows anything. In technology world defects happen thats ok. Im giving bad review mostly for denon's horrible support. They have not bothered to investigate issue or do anything on their part. They did not even accept returning it. Only thing denon support did was to make me wait for 2 hours on call. Thanks to Amazon and its great support im returning it. Beware, if your receiver has problems dont expect any communication or help from Dennon
customer_reviews.author: Roma Margvelashvili

customer_reviews.title: Packing quality is not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Is this a refurb? Packing quality is terrible. No original box. No instructions. Shrink wrapped. If it doesn’t work when I get it going, I’m sending it back. Come on Amazon - step it up. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: ALESIA B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage.  Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap garbage. I bought this to replace a dead Bose sound bar. I went through the entire configuration with no problems, and everything worked great for a few days. Then while watching a program the sound changes to loud static, but the picture is fine. Turn it off, start it back up and everything is good for a while, then loud static again. Just about sent the cat through the ceiling. This thing is going back, and I am going to get another Bose sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ruckus

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished and defective product
customer_reviews.text: I bought it couple of months ago thinking is fictional brand new product. After hooking it up last week, as soon as I try to turn it on, a cloud of smoke was coming out of the receiver. I noticed after looking closer at the papers that came with the unit that mentioned it was a refurbished one. Since it’s been more than a month, I think I am stocked with a burnt out, defected product. I am going to contact the manufacturer, maybe they would take back. But totally disappointed at amazon for selling a refurbished unit as knew.
customer_reviews.author: David Hamedany

customer_reviews.title: dont be fooled on this unit by the Denon name
customer_reviews.text: good lord what happened to Denon? this thing is trash. nothing about this unit is anything Denon was once known for. seriously im going to put this in my garage and go with my older model, so dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: James delaney

customer_reviews.title: Bought NEW but received REFURBISHED
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased as new but received a refurbished unit.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Simonetti

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: After 45 days of using it it fried - did not work anymore - just emits a popping sound every second on all inputs. Reset it and went through it with an Amazon agent but can't seem to find out how to return it. Any assistance would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: TRK

customer_reviews.title: parts missing out of the box
customer_reviews.text: No FM antenna and when I call Denon you get a message that they will call you back, te3ch calls you and sends you to their parts provider who asays they don't have the part... aaarrrggghhh...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: DENON 4K RECEIVER
customer_reviews.text: Awesome audio and video. No glitches with a connected Apple 4K TV or my 4K UHD SONY Blu-ray player. Blows away my old SONY.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Disconnection issues with iPhone and the app
customer_reviews.text: The sound is just fine. The issue we have is with connecting the remote on the iPhone. When you close the app you always have to reconnect. Then when you reconnect it connects Bluetooth not via iPhone. It’s just annoying. You also can’t have two phones connected at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: ambernjosh

customer_reviews.title: Not quality receiver
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for the first month. It's started shutting down. Called tech support Amazon and denon . Denon says that I must be turning volume up to high or the power supply must not be correct or the speaker wires are not connected properly or there is a bad speaker. I received on July 20 2019. Don't buy denon devices and I don't recommend. 2 months old and it is about done. Really don't believe that you are not supposed to turn the volume up to max and then it shuts down. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Roamer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, HDMI and video issues
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. This receiver says that is supports Dolby Vision, which it technically does if you don't mind the OSD changing to random whack (PINK?!?!?!) colors when you are watching something in that mode. This is explained as 'normal' behavior in the manual. Also, while my old Onkyo handled ARC just fine, this unit keeps switching to the ARC input when it is not being asked to. Not a great experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Trouble
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. I liked the on screen set-up. Then after a few weeks HDMI control suddenly stopped working and the receiver wouldn't work with the universal remote for my cable box. You needed multiple remotes to watch TV. Denon customer support was no help. They went over all of the settings and then blamed my TV (that's been trouble free for several years). The nearest service center is 350 miles away and I would have to pay for repairs. It's too late to return it to Amazon. Hundreds of dollars down the drain. How did this get a 4.3 out of 5 star rating??
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: CBL input died after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Ran ok for 1 year and 3 weeks. Occasionally the connection between the cable box and the receiver would need to be reset by unplugging the hdmi from the receiver, but it wasn’t too often. Today, the connection died. I made sure it wasn’t the cord or the cable box (the cable works fine going into the blueray input). Also tried hooking the xbox into the cable input and same problem with no pic or sound. It works fine in the other inputs. The other issue is the sound is quiet in all inputs except cable (when it worked).
customer_reviews.author: M. Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: Nice receiver for the price . . .
customer_reviews.text: This receiver features easy set-up, good sound quality and a clear and concise (if not a bit "clunky") on-screen user interface. My only issue with it was the fact that it would not honor the designation of my cable box as the default input on power-up. It would always start up by connecting either to the DVD player or Amazon Firestick. I had two discussions with Denon tech support, to no avail. Contrary to some other reviews, the subwoofer connection is the RF type. Also, the support team at Denon was very friendly and knowledgeable, even though we could not resolve the power-up problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lester8r

customer_reviews.title: HDMI ports keep dying
customer_reviews.text: On a regular basis, we've been having to move our TiVo Bolt (the only device we use regularly) from one HDMI input to another, because the ports keep dying... they just show black. *Everything* is on surge protection and backup battery. I think my final HDMI input just died, so now I'm going to have to replace this receiver, which is less than 5 months old. I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Receiver is great, especially for the price but the iPhone app is sorely lacking..
customer_reviews.text: Receiver is great, especially for the price but the iPhone app is sorely lacking.. - App on phone is very inconsistent in connecting via BT and confirmed it is not a phone issue - When using the included remote, the onscreen graphics look like 1998, definitely not up to date visually - Wish receiver setup would allow HARD (locked) assignment of audio output by HDMI output, i.e. HDMI audio for HDMI 1, optical for HDMI 2, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer W.

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, its awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Been running this unit for a couple of months now on a daily basis. Sound quality is really very good - impressively good for being "cheap." It does everything one could expect a <280$ receiver to do. Doesn't feel cheap and it's perfect for an apartment paired with some bookshelf klipsch reference series speakers and a polk sub. Only four minor cons: -remote volume controls could be vastly improved as others have stated -no 24-bit audio usb playback -no wifi -not able to rename assignable inputs (who has cable these days??) Besides that, setup/calibration was really easy, operation is easy and has more than enough power for a budget receiver. Bluetooth also works well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kiluam

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and fast to setup
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a JVC receiver with this model after the old (15 years of use) receiver finally died. I have not had the Denon AVR-S540BT Receiver very long so my review only covers the initial setup. The setup process of connecting all my existing speakers and TV to the receiver took longer than the actual setup and balance of the sound level and quality. The external device connections were straight forward and easy enough to complete. When I got the part where the speaker volume and balance was needed, the receiver's instructions indicated to plug in a provided external microphone and place it in the center of the room. Then I let the receiver automatically do the rest.
customer_reviews.author: fred the cat

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great with my 5.1 speakers and 4K TV. The HDMI with ARC port does work, where the TV's sounds comes back to the receiver and out the 5.1 speaker set. The auto configuration with the speaker mic made speaker setup easy. The step by step prompts for connecting the speakers were clear and short. I hope this receiver lasts as long as my 18 year old Denon receiver which still works.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen_Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: Good value/features for price
customer_reviews.text: This AV Receiver is serving its purpose for me which is getting rid of a bunch of optical & rca cables while expanding input sources, including Bluetooth connections; a single HDMI cable per source; clean and simple. it comes with a calibration mic which helps sets the surround sound according to the room. I would miss the sound modes of my old Sony 5.1 equipment, but this Denon has DTS Neo and enough basic modes. One thing that looks old (and I mean 80's MS-DOS old) is this Denon's on-screen menu display, although it is easy to navigate. Overall: it provides good sound and makes A/V connections a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Aguilar_Aceves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Sound
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this receiver. It sounds good and has incredible features, for the price. Happy it is made in Vietnam, as opposed to China. Great Bluetooth. Love the USB playback feature. Remote could be of a little better quality. It just does not feel as good as the rest of the receiver. I am excited about this product. It sounds great through a Bose Acoustamass speaker system, with Klipsch Center Speaker. I have always liked Denon products. This one did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality unit that gives digital audio the richness of analog.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just had this for one day, but I have to disagree with many of the other reviews. The unit was easy to set up and the microphone for the speaker setup provides audiohpillic perfection. My space is a small office with big a$$ speakers. The sound is rich and feels more like deep rooted analog than digital. That may be because of the B&W speakers, but with my other 15 year old Denon receiver... well it just doesn’t compare. This is an exceptional unit, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight W Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Trusty old-version receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my old receiver died and my new sound bar was not compatible with my relatively new TV. Technology can be maddening. This Denon doesn’t match the performance of my once top-of-the-line Sony, but it will work until I feel like splurging for a TV that will work with my top-of-the-line sound bar. Video is better than other receivers I’ve had in other rooms, and sound is good, although sometimes you have to crank it to hear the broadcast. For what I paid, I’m quite happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Simple set up, great quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: When I was researching my home theatre options, I met an Amazon tech who used to install home theater systems. He highly recommended Definitive Technology speakers, and Denon receivers. I am very pleased with his recommendations. This receiver was very easy to install, gave simple step by step instructions, and got me up and running in minutes. I just wish the remote was capable of connecting with my TV so I could have 1 less remote to keep up with. Otherwise, this is a great receiver for my 5 speaker surround sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gonder

customer_reviews.title: Was not a deep chassis so would fit in my cabinet without coming out back
customer_reviews.text: For the cost does very good and sounds great! Only problem is the Denon remote and my sony xbr 65in. work on the same frequency- so if I use power button both come on or off -other controls are affected the same way. I have a universal remote (no longer made ) with 700 pre programed channels. All the Denon and Sony pre programed (at least 50 or more channels) worked as one. So I unplug the receiver unless I use it./ Otherwise the remote is fine
customer_reviews.author: David Early

customer_reviews.title: Hooked up 4 small Bose surround sound speakers and the unit smoked and never turned on.  Beware
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up 4 small Bose surround sound speakers and the unit smoked and never turned on. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Swo

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get a single Receiver that I wanted by any other manufacturer or model. It was August of 2020... Between Covid, the tariffs on electronics from china and the Amazon buying frenzy... this was the only thing decent that fit my needs in my price range that I could get with out months and months of a wait. And I tried Best Buy, Adorama, B and H, Target and Walmart... My music is important to me so... I bought this with zero choice. Luckily, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W Younker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent home theater receiver. Highly recommend for up to 500sq ft spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made 5.2 receiver which has HDR electronics with new DD+ decoders which sound great. You need to set your cable box to surround with heavy dynamic range for audio to get the full effect. And it plays Netflix in DD+ which is brilliant. I use it with old Sony ss-ms367T satellites and a 140W 8inch sub and they match up perfectly for movies and music. This receiver is perfect for small speakers so I wouldn't try to run expensive three way speakers with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rush

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Great value. One flaw
customer_reviews.text: the screen and sound quality are superb. Especially for the price! The only thing that Im not happy with is the fact that this device doesn’t come with a “sleep timer” function. Like many, I usually sleep with tv set scheduled to sleep shortly after I do. This device, unfortunately, does not have “sleep timer” function. This means that I have to turn off the device first then go to bed. To me, its a major change in my bedtime routine.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Shaheen

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: It’s great when it works, which it did for the first few months we had it. Now it won’t display anything in 2160p. Also, it stopped outputting TV audio (via the ARC port). I temporarily resolved the issue by a factory reset, but even that no longer works. In short, this was a huge disappointment. I intend to replace this with either a Yamaha or Pioneer receiver. Denon needs to do better.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Solid receiver at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar Denon for several years, but it recently died. So I replaced it with this one. Good feature set, except that it’s missing network connectivity (either WiFi or Ethernet). That should be pretty much standard these days.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: This things sounds like garbage.
customer_reviews.text: sending it back because it sounds like a little crappy toy. Like REALLY BAD. My only regret is that I can’t give this this thing negative stars. Returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: _Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outch!
customer_reviews.text: Well i bought this for two reasons: first reason is it’s a trusted brand and second reason for the Bluetooth and i must say the Bluetooth stopped working and i had to send it in And Denon wanted me to pay for the shipping even though their product was faulty. Two months later I finally got the receiver back and the Bluetooth worked for about three months and it hasn’t worked since so pretty much a waste of $250 which now gives me less options when it comes to brands because I will never buy Denon again.
customer_reviews.author: Frodo

customer_reviews.title: Love the easy balancing set up
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of reading, but once you get through it the balancing of the speakers is great. It really helped with our quirky set up. It's a pleasure watching a show and having the sound system improve the sound effects. I also will adjust the speaker closest to me to be a bit louder (for my old ears) and not annoy the wife. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Monster

customer_reviews.title: Very Good, and has great connection options. Comes with a microphone to setup audio
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, audio is much better than the soundbar quality it replaced for us.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Awesome budget  amp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this amp because my 20 year old Sony didn’t support our new technology. This is a very powerful, inexpensive, surround sound amp. Very easy to set up once the speakers are connected. It comes with a setup microphone to automatically tune your speakers to the seating position in your room. It has Bluetooth, so you can connect your phone or computer to listen to music. I hooked up my existing JBL speakers and it literally rattles the windows. My sons thought we were having an earthquake the first time I used it because their bedroom is directly above the tv room. Clear, crisp, sound......and enough power to annoy your neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power and features for just under 200 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong electronics burn-in smell for about an hour after firing it up, but it seems to have gone away. I think this is an excellent low-cost option to boost the sound and video quality of my modest home theater system. I bought a $235 JBL/Levitron 5.1 speaker and subwoofer set and they really work well together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I originally had 4K pass through problems but I found out it was my HDMI cable, not this receiver, so I'm changing my review. It works as it should, good sound, easy to set up and configure. No issues. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LB Zoo

customer_reviews.title: refurbished
customer_reviews.text: I bought new, not a refurbished. If i wanted refurbished, i found it for $225 elsewhere. So that kind of ticks me off. It installed fine and seems to be working. Not sure why some people were complaining about the setup. Just follow the onscreen directions. It calibrates the speakers automagically, and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: bigf00t

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth barely works when sitting in front of the receiver. Installed a different one on the unit and don’t have any more problem. Last Denon I will ever buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this used from Amazon's warehouse. The box contained only the receiver and remote, both slightly scuffed/marred/bent--but that's OK for me. What surprised me was nothing else was in the box--no instructions, no FM antenna, no AM antenna, no batteries, and most disappointing, no microphone for automatically calibrating the audio.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leach

customer_reviews.title: What more can I say: I'm hooked on this reciever.
customer_reviews.text: Did not know anything about a receiver for surround sound but I bought this one. We were doing a remodel and installed 10 speakers in a cathedral ceiling throughout the house. Also installed volumn control in bedrooms. My neighbor wired them up and the sound blew me away. I could jam and rock n roll while cleaning and love love this set up.
customer_reviews.author: Chanchee

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOUD. Like deafening loud. I bought this for my boyfriend after listening to him spew about his friend that had one. He LOVES it. We got surround sound speakers and he placed all this in my bedroom. I would say this receiver would be better set for a larger living room or theatre room but the quality is great, it was easy to set up, and it was probably the best gift I could have ever given him. He was SO EXCITED!
customer_reviews.author: jrdynsync

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a Dream!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews before buying and I would love to know who these people are but here's the Truth! Easy to setup! More than Loud enough and the auto room/system tuning was amazingly accurate! If you're in need of a new system this one is what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: Great basic receiver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago to use in a smaller home theatre. It had the features I needed at the time. Its sounds great, plenty of power to drive my hungry Polk speakers and sub, and wasn't overly difficult to set up. I'm not sure what others are complaining about because I've had no problems with the usb or Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, price and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: This is an entry level unit, but it sounds SO much better than the Yamaha unit that it is replacing. The sounds are clear and amazing. When I get more money, I'd like to try the unit with ATMOS feature. I recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Don A

customer_reviews.title: Worth the mid hifi price
customer_reviews.text: happy with it so far - i haven't set it up as a home theater receiver - i am temporary using it in the bedroom with my home theater speakers instead and am happy with the sound. I used the receivers calibration software and mic. Much better than me messing with the settings. Audio is good - depending on your speakers
customer_reviews.author: luis david muniz

customer_reviews.title: 4K pass-thru doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: The 4K capability of this for pass-they doesn’t work. Upgraded to 1.6gbps HDMI fancy cables and it still won’t pass 4K to the TV from devices hooked to the receiver. It is almost as if the receiver being recognized as a non-4K device just tells the TV not to go into 4K mode. The receiver should identify itself as 4K, then it would probably work. I welcome feedback from Denon or anyone who has gotten the 4K to work. Would be nice to run a single HDMI to the receiver and then plug devices into the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Denon
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Denon so I'm a bit biased going in but this receiver delivers at this price point. Connectivity is decent, sound is great. Pushing Klipsch bookshelf speakers (4) and a Polk Audio 10" Sub nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good luck setting up, say a prayer you’ll need it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 weeks ago and still unable to get sound from my speakers through my TV. Extremely difficult to setup and now awaiting a call from DENON to hopefully get it working correctly. I wouldn’t recommend whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: DENON
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up.. sounds great everything is satisfying so far so good I would recommend for A great price for 5.1 system.
customer_reviews.author: john cradduck sr

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertising - product is refurbished by Denon
customer_reviews.text: Be aware! - we just purchased my order yesterday and my husband was surprised when he found this receiver was reconditioned or refurbished by Denon. When checking my order it does not say anything about being refurbished. In fact, it is listed as new. It works just fine, but it only has 90 days warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: I have been having Denon receivers for years, just replaced my old one with this. Same product quality just new features. Bluetooth is very convenient. I have not tried all the features yet but so far I am very satisfied with the purchase. Would buy it again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Won't power up after just a couple months. It's a paperweight now.
customer_reviews.author: HiTekRedneck

customer_reviews.title: It Delivers everything it promised.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the wailings of a few who couldn't comprehend the simple instructions, every phase of installation and set-up was breeze. Denon has been in this business from the early 1900's and their products reflect this experience.
customer_reviews.author: The ROAR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived earlier than I expected and the sound quality is excellent. Got it as a Father's Day gift and I would highly recommend it for the guy who love quality electronics
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Receiver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Denon AVR-S540BT Receiver due to my Old 1984 Pioneer receiver burning out. I bought it after reading reviews and ease of operation. This unit produces amazing sound. I set up a full surround sound speaker set. the quality and clarity of music, TV, computer, Bluetooth, Record player and others is amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JSawyer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well. Quit working.
customer_reviews.text: This thing overheats sitting on the shelf in the garage and the controller quit working a week after getting it. Now the receiver quit working totally.
customer_reviews.author: nathen miller

customer_reviews.title: will not tune in to fm stations well at all
customer_reviews.text: bought a different antenna for fm and still could not get stations that I had on my old receiver. could be due to the fact that this is an avr and not an am/fm receiver, which is what I bought and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mh

customer_reviews.title: It's OK For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an older Denon amp with this one for the HDMI inputs. My older amp was much heavier and had lots more inputs. So far this one works well and I also enjoy the Bluetooth. It is not nearly as loud as my old receiver on the same speakers. I'm not sure what to make of that.
customer_reviews.author: YT

customer_reviews.title: Owners m  have to down load and print
customer_reviews.text: Could Not get a owners manual hard copy. Demon wants to charge for tec support .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, clean sound for low price. Update on 02/06/2019. The rear left surround channel has stopped working! Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Davis

customer_reviews.title: Denon quality and performance!
customer_reviews.text: 3 years later and still sounds great. Love this reciever. It has power and sound quality is good. Just bought the new model for a dedicated movie room. For the money, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Ttopps!

customer_reviews.title: Denon Receiver does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works with several bluetooth devices and easily connected to my 5.2 home theater system. Very happy with my purchase!

product_meta.title: Denon AVR-S540BT Receiver, 5.2 channel, 4K Ultra HD Audio and Video, Home Theater System, built-in Bluetooth and USB port, Compatible with HEOS Link for Wireless Music Streaming
product_meta.description: Style:Denon AVR-S540BTThe 5.2 channel AVR-S540BT features Dolby Vision, HDR, HLG and 4K video upscaling for a stunning home theater experience. It includes 5 HDMI inputs at 4K/60 Hz with full-rate pass-through and HDCP 2.2 support on all HDMI ports. Use the front panel USB port to listen to your favorite tracks seamlessly, or stream music via Bluetooth or HEOS with your smart devices via any of the popular streaming services like Spotify, TIDAL, Pandora and more. Control power, volume and source with the Denon 500 Series Remote app. With our award-winning Denon Setup Assistant, the AVR-S540BT is just as easy to setup as it is to enjoy.
feature_bullets: MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR NEW 4K ULTRA HD TV. This stereo receiver delivers exceptional brightness, contrast and color leveraging industry leading HLG (hybrid Log-Gamma), HDR (High Dynamic Range), BT.2020, Wide Color Gamut and 4:4:4 Pure Color sub-sampling to impress even the most discerning viewers. Experience 5 AMPLIFIERS (140W per channel) driving amazing power, realistic display and immersive sound across any room

YOUR FAVORITE MUSIC AT YOUR FINGERTIPS - With a built-in Bluetooth, amp up your music from eight different devices, be it a computer or any other smart device and transmit it to a wide range of speaker systems. CREATE AN INTEGRATED AUDIO SYSTEM in conjunction with DENON HEOS LINK for a thrilling multi-room experience, which also allows you to play back music from almost every digital streaming service like Spotify, TIDAL, Pandora and many more
OUR EASY ON-SCREEN SETUP ASSISTANT walks you through clear simple instructions to connect your TV, specific EQ settings and helps you optimize your surround sound
FOUR QUICK SELECT BUTTONS ON THE FRONT PANEL help you store your preferred audio settings for television, Blu-Ray, and more, and allows you to switch between them quickly

With its 100-year legacy and Japanese precision technology, Denon AV Receiver S540BT DELIVERS MULTI-DIMENSIONAL SURROUND SOUND with 5.2 channel compatibility and SUPPORTS 4K ULTRA HD PICTURE QUALITY, perfect for your home theater and entertainment system

You can also connect the Denon AVR with your Smart TV remote and ACCESS ALL YOUR SPEAKER SOURCES AND SURROUND MODE SELECTIONS USING JUST ONE REMOTE. Or simply USE YOUR SMARTPHONE AS A REMOTE. Download the Denon 500 Series Remote app for iOS and Android and control the receiver through your phone. Convenient, isn't it.
